Install Web Clipper (Developer Version)

This is a developer version of Web Clipper. Follow these steps to install:

Download Web Clipper (.zip file)

Installation Instructions:

  1. Click the button above to download the .zip file.
  2. Unzip the downloaded file to a location on your computer.
  3. Open Google Chrome and navigate to chrome://extensions
  4. Enable "Developer mode" by toggling the switch in the top right corner.
  5. Click on "Load unpacked" button that appears after enabling Developer mode.
  6. Navigate to the folder where you unzipped the extension and select it.
  7. The Web Clipper extension should now be installed and visible in your extensions list.

Note: This is a developer installation method. The extension won't automatically update, and you may see warnings about using an unpacked extension. For regular use, please install from the Chrome Web Store once available.
